div.p: Codes providing the status of an observation.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/observation-status defines the following codes:

tr.td: The existence of the observation is registered, but there is no result yet available.
This is an initial or interim observation: data may be incomplete or unverified.
The observation has been modified subsequent to being Final.
The observation is unavailable because the measurement was not started or not completed (also sometimes called "aborted").
The observation has been withdrawn following previous final release.
The observation status is unknown. Note that "unknown" is a value of last resort and every attempt should be made to provide a meaningful value other than "unknown".

description.value: Codes providing the status of an observation.

definition.value: The existence of the observation is registered, but there is no result yet available.
This is an initial or interim observation: data may be incomplete or unverified.
The observation has been modified subsequent to being Final.
The observation is unavailable because the measurement was not started or not completed (also sometimes called "aborted").
The observation has been withdrawn following previous final release.
The observation status is unknown. Note that "unknown" is a value of last resort and every attempt should be made to provide a meaningful value other than "unknown".
